Function Documentation

int mxcam_read_eeprom_config_mem ( CONFIG_AREA  area,
char *  buf,
unsigned short  len 
)

mxcam_read_eeprom_config_mem: read the config memory area stored on camera persistent storage memory

Parameters:
area :area to read config data
*buf :config data will be written on buf on success
len :length of config data needs to copied from camera memory
Return values:
MXCAM_ERR_INVALID_PARAM - if any one of the following condition meet

  • devhandle is NULL
  • buf is NULL
  • len is 0
  • area >= LAST_INFO
MXCAM_ERR_UNINITIALIZED_VENDOR_MEMORY - if the vendor area not initialzed properly on the camera.
Negativevalue - upon libusb error
MXCAM_OK - upon success
Remarks:
read camera configuration record from camera persistent storage memory
int mxcam_get_config_size ( CONFIG_AREA  area,
unsigned short *  size_out 
)

mxcam_get_config_size: get camera configuration record size for the config area

Parameters:
area :area to get config record size
*size_out :returns identified size from the camera
Return values:
MXCAM_ERR_INVALID_PARAM - if any one of the following condition meet

  • devhandle is NULL
  • *size_out is NULL
MXCAM_ERR_GET_CFG_SIZE_UNKNOWN_AREA - if area >= LAST_INFO
Negativevalue - upon libusb error
MXCAM_OK - upon success
Remarks:
get camera configuration record size from camera persistent storage memory for a specific CONFIG_AREA
int mxcam_read_flash_image_header ( image_header_t *  header  ) 

mxcam_read_flash_image_header: get 64 bytes flash image header

Parameters:
*header :pointer to image_header_t structure
Return values:
MXCAM_ERR_INVALID_PARAM - if any one of the following condition meet

  • devhandle is NULL
  • header is NULL
Negativevalue - upon libusb error
MXCAM_OK - upon success
Remarks:
get 64 bytes flash image header image_header_t. This image header information used to get camera information. ih_name in image_header_t is used stored camera firmware version information
